Titles.eng: Saint Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac
Titles.jpn: Knights of the Zodiac 聖闘士星矢

Summaries.eng: Seiya and the Knights of the Zodiac rise again to protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena, but a dark prophecy hangs over them all.
Summaries.jpn: 星矢と干支の騎士団は、人類を救うために悪の勢力との戦いでギリシャの女神アテナを守ると約束しています。

Summaries.eng: After a virtual eternity, a new struggle is about to unfold now again over the Cloth. A boy named Seiya has crossed way over to Greece to undergo the training to become a Saint and obtained the Cloth, Bronze cloth, the lowest position among Saints. Every Saint takes a constellation as their tutelary god. And Seiya's guardian star is Pegasus. Now, the saints gather together from all over the world to participate in the "Galatic War" - championship of Saints, aiming at the Gold Cloth, the symbol of ruler of the Saints. The curtain for Galatic War has been cut open. During the death battle between the Saints, Phoenix, the Black Saint, suddenly appeared on the scene and runs off with Gold Cloth in front of a full house in his ambition to become ruler of the world. Seiya and his fellow bronze cloth warriors go after Phoenix and his "Shadow Army" to retrieve the lost Gold Cloth...
Summaries.fra: L'histoire reprend le début de l'œuvre originale, jusqu'aux combats contre les Chevaliers d'Argent.

Summaries.eng: After exhibiting special powers, Seiya is approached by the enigmatic Alman Kido, who urges him to fulfill his destiny and become a Bronze Knight.
Seiya obtains the Pegasus Armor with ease, but to be a true Knight of Athena, he must first prove himself in the Galaxian Wars tournament.
Believing in the dark prophecy, Magnus confronts Lady Sienna. Seiya faces his toughest opponent yet: Dragon Long.
Reluctant to fight, Andromeda Shaun takes a defensive approach against Unicorn Jab using her Nebula Chain. Meanwhile, Vander's army attacks.
Seiya takes down a helicopter to retrieve the stolen Gold Armor from Phoenix Nero, only to be confronted by Vander's Black Knights.
Phoenix Nero has built up his overwhelming power with hate. To stop him, the Bronze Knights must combine their strength to reclaim the Gold Armor.
Seiya awakens, having survived the collapsing volcano. He quickly learns Sanctuary has sent Silver Knight Misty and his old master Marin to kill him.
Fearing for Sienna's safety, Marin orders Seiya to protect her. Alone, Marin faces the Silver Knights Hound Asterion and Whale Morris.
Reunited with the Bronze Knights, Seiya and the others search for Sienna. Silver Knight Jamian the Crow appears, determined to stop them.
Perseus Argol's Medusa Shield turns its opponents into stone. One of the Bronze Knights makes a life-altering decision to protect Sienna.
Graad assembles his own Black Knights to protect mankind from the gods. When his forces abduct Sienna, the Bronze Knights set out to rescue her.
The Bronze Knights face Graad's upgraded Black Knights. Though Seiya and the others gain the upper hand, Graad proves to be a formidable foe.

Titles.deu: Knights of the Zodiac: Saint Seiya - Battle for Sanctuary

Summaries.eng: The young warriors who protect the goddess Athena are known as the Knights of the Zodiac. One young orphan, Seiya, is destined to become the Pegasus Knight. Athena has been born into this world, but this time under a dark prophecy that she will lose the war against Poseidon and Hades, and lead mankind to ruin. Seiya stands up against the prophecy, willing to protect her at all cost. But now a god-killer arrow has struck her heart. To save her life, Seiya must ascend Sanctuary and defeat twelve legendary Gold Knights - and he only has twelve hours to do it. Will he make it? And what will happen to the dark prophecy if he succeeds?"
Summaries.fra: Afin de démasquer le traître qui se cache au Sanctuaire et de prouver que Saori est bien la réincarnation d'Athéna, Seiya et ses compagnons se rendent sur place. Mais un obstacle de taille se dresse face à eux : les chevaliers d'or.
Summaries.deu: Die jungen Krieger, die Göttin Athena beschützen, sind als Krieger des Zodiac bekannt und der Waise Seiya ist dazu bestimmt, Pegasus-Ritter zu werden. Athena wurde wieder in diese Welt geboren, aber diesmal unter der dunklen Prophezeiung, dass sie den Krieg gegen Poseidon und Hades verlieren und damit die Menschheit ins Verderben stürzt. Seiya stellt sich gegen die Prophezeiung und will Athena um jeden Preis beschützen, doch ein göttertötender Pfeil hat ihr Herz durchbohrt. Um ihr Leben zu retten, muss Seiya das Sanktuarium erklimmen und zwölf legendäre goldene Ritter besiegen – dafür hat er nur zwölf Stunden Zeit. Wird er es schaffen und was geschieht mit der dunklen Prophezeiung, falls er Erfolg haben sollte?

Summaries.eng: Athena is attacked by a godslayer arrow and Seiya and company must fight against the Gold Knights to save her.
Seiya faces Aldebaran in the House of Taurus to go ahead and save Athena, but his rival is really powerful.
While Seiya and the others have trouble dealing with Gemini, the action also takes place on Andromeda Island.
Shun confronts the Gemini Gold Knight while Hyoga mysteriously reappears before Camus, his former master.
Shiryu goes ahead and arrives at the House of Cancer, where his corresponding Gold Knight is waiting for him ready to kill him.
As Long seeks a way to defeat Cancer Deathmask, Seiya reaches the House of Leo where he is unexpectedly confronted by a former friend.

Titles.eng: Battle for the House of Leo

Summaries.eng: Already gripped in a life-and-death struggle against Gold Knight Leo Aiolia, Seiya is forced into even more danger when an archenemy returns.
While Marin, Genet, Aldebaran, and Mu head for Star Hill, Seiya and the Bronze Knights find the path to the House of Virgo blocked by the Skull Knights.
Marin, Genet, Aldebaran, and Mu begin to investigate Star Hill, and find unexpected danger at every turn.

Titles.eng: The One as Powerful as a God

Summaries.eng: Inside the House of Virgo, Seiya and the Bronze Knights face the powerful Gold Knight Shaka – with the help of an old acquaintance.
Phoenix Nero fights a losing battle against Gold Knight Virgo Shaka. To have any chance of overcoming Shaka’s unlimited power, Nero must dig deep into his soul and face his own death.
Time is running out for Sienna. While the Knights discover the identity of the true evil over Sanctuary, Seiya is locked in battle with Gold Knight Scorpio Milo.
Seiya and his friends arrive at the House of Scorpio and engage in a deadly battle with the Gold Knight, Milo.
Former rivals of the Bronze Knights, Jabu and the others come together to help the goddess Athena.

Titles.eng: Return to the Land of the Dead

Summaries.eng: Although there are four hours left before the god-killing arrow pierces her heart, Saori is on the brink of death. Meanwhile, Seiya meets Cleo, a mysterious woman who learns about Saori's crisis.
Summaries.jpn: 神殺しの矢が心臓を貫くまであと４時間を残しているものの、死の淵をさまよう沙織。一方星矢は謎多き女性クレオと出会い、沙織の危機を知る…

Summaries.eng: Seiya and the other Bronze Knights encounter an unexpected enemy, Aiolos, the Gold Knight of Sagittarius. The four end up being transported to their respective training camps...
Summaries.jpn: 星矢たち青銅聖闘士 4 人は人馬宮で予期せぬ敵、黄金聖闘士射手座(サジタリアス)のアイオロスと遭遇する。4 人はそれぞれの修行地へと転送され…

Summaries.eng: Just as they pass through the House of Capricorn, Dragon Shiryu becomes separated from Seiya and his companions as a huge crack tears through the earth...
Summaries.jpn: 磨羯宮を通り抜けたその時、ドラゴン紫龍は大地を裂く大きな亀裂を前に星矢たち３人の仲間と切り離されてしまう…

Summaries.eng: Hyoga confronts his master, the Gold Knight of Aquarius, Camus, and challenges him to a battle for his life.
Summaries.jpn: キグナス氷河は己の師、黄金聖闘士水瓶座（アクエリアス）のカミュと対峙し、命を賭した戦いに挑む。

Summaries.eng: Shun and Seiya arrive at the House of Pisces. There, Shun tells Seiya to move on, while he faces Aphrodite, the Gold Knight who killed his master Daedalus.

In the House of Pisces, Andromeda Shaun continues her life-and-death battle against her master’s killer, Gold Knight Aphrodite. In the midst of the struggle, Shaun flashes back to the events in her past that molded her and made her who she is.
Summaries.jpn: 双魚宮で恩師の仇、黄金聖闘士魚座（ピスケス）のアフロディーテと決死の闘いを続けるアンドロメダ瞬。厳しい闘いの中、瞬の真の力が開放される！

Titles.eng: Death Match in the Grand Master’s Chambers

Summaries.eng: Seiya is near-death, downed by the deadly Demon Roses. He must find a way to stay alive and survive as he nears his goal - to reach the Grand Master.

As the final flame on the clock tower is about to burn out, Seiya confronts the Grand Master and discovers his shocking true identity. In the face of the Grand Master’s overwhelming power, Seiya must dig deep if he hopes for any chance of victory.

Titles.eng: The Face of the Grand Master

Summaries.eng: Phoenix Nero returns to join the battle against the Grand Master. The two battle as more secrets are revealed about the Grand Master’s fate. But as both Sienna and Seiya lie near-death, is it all too little too late?
Summaries.jpn: 星矢のピンチを救うためフェニックス一輝が再び現れ、教皇の前に立ちふさがる。二人の闘いは教皇の更なる秘密を明らかにしていく。

Summaries.eng: At the top of Sanctuary, time has almost run out and the epic battle is nearly ended. Now the fate of the universe hangs in the balance as Seiya makes one final desperate attempt to save Sienna.
Summaries.jpn: 沙織に残された時間はあとわずか、聖域（サンクチュアリ）の頂上で聖闘士たちの壮絶な闘いは終わりを告げようとしていた…。
